definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-mazer_entity] if entity @e[type=armor_stand,name=MazerTrap,distance=..2] if entity @e[tag=lotw-mazer_entity_target,distance=..2] run execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=MazerTrap,limit=1,sort=random] run summon armor_stand ~ ~-1 ~ {NoGravity:1b,Marker:1b,Invisible:0b,CustomName:'{"text":"lotw-mazer_entity"}',ShowArms:1b,NoBasePlate:1b}</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-mazer_entity] if entity @e[type=armor_stand,name=MazerTrap,distance=..2] if entity @e[tag=lotw-mazer_entity_target,distance=..2] run particle minecraft:flash ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0 1 force</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute at @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-mazer_entity] if entity @e[type=armor_stand,name=MazerTrap,distance=..2] if entity @e[tag=lotw-mazer_entity_target,distance=..2] run playsound minecraft:entity.zombie.attack_wooden_door ambient @a[distance=..50] ~ ~ ~ 1 0 0.025</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><next><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">execute as @e[type=armor_stand,name=lotw-mazer_entity] at @s if entity @e[type=armor_stand,name=MazerTrap,distance=..2] if entity @e[tag=lotw-mazer_entity_target,distance=..2] run kill @s</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
